name: UpdateTrelloChecklist
description:
Updates an existing checklist on Trello.

Use this tool to modify the properties of a specific checklist within Trello by providing its ID.

parameters.name: checklist_name
parameters.description: The updated name of the checklist. Should be between 1 and 16384 characters.

value_schema.description: Name of the new checklist being created. Should be length of 1 to 16384.

parameters.name: checklist_position
parameters.description: Specifies the position of the checklist on the Trello card. Acceptable values are `top`, `bottom`, or a positive integer for a specific position.

value_schema.description: Determines the position of the checklist on the card. One of: `top`, `bottom`, or a positive number.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the new checklist being created. Should be length of 1 to 16384.

value_schema.description: Name of the new checklist being created. Should be length of 1 to 16384.

parameters.name: pos
parameters.description: Determines the position of the checklist on the card. One of: `top`, `bottom`, or a positive number.

value_schema.description: Determines the position of the checklist on the card. One of: `top`, `bottom`, or a positive number.
